00029    /* 
00030    * Constructor.   
00031    */
00032    NphIntegrator::NphIntegrator(MdSystem& system)
00033    : MdIntegrator(system), W_(0.0)
00034    {
00035       // start with zero barostat momentum
00036       eta_.zero();
00037 
00038    }

00043    NphIntegrator::~NphIntegrator()

00046    /* 
00047    * Read parameter and configuration files, initialize system.
00048    */
00049    void NphIntegrator::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00050    {
00051       read<double>(in, "dt", dt_);
00052       read<double>(in, "W", W_);
00053       std::string modeIn;
00054       read<LatticeSystem>(in, "mode", mode_);
00055 
00056       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00057       prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00058 
00059    }
00060 
00061    /* 
00062    * Initialize constants.
00063    */
00064    void NphIntegrator::setup() 
00065    {
00066       double mass;
00067       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00068       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00069          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00070          prefactors_[i] = 0.5*dt_/mass;
00071       }
00072    }
00073 
00074    void NphIntegrator::step() 
00075    {
00076       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00077       double prefactor;
00078       int    iSpecies, nSpecies;
00079 
00080       nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00081 
00082       /* perform the first half step of the explicitly reversible NPH integration scheme.
00083   
00084          This follows from operator factorization
00085   
00086          - orthorhombic case:
00087   
00088            1) eta_alpha(t+dt/2) = eta_alpha(t) + dt/2 * V/L_alpha * ( P_{alpha,alpha}(t) - P_ext)
00089            2) v' = v(t) + (1/2)a(t)*dt
00090            3) L(t+dt/2) = L(t) + dt*eta(t+dt/2)/(2*W)
00091            4) r'_alpha = r(t) + v'*dt* (L_{alpha}^2(t)/L_{alpha}^2(t+dt/2))
00092            5a) L(t+dt) = L(t+dt/2) + dt*eta(t+dt/2)/2/W
00093            5b) r_alpha(t+dt) = L_alpha(t+dt)/L_alpha(t)*r'_alpha
00094            5c) v''_alpha = L_alpha(t)/L_alpha(t+dt) * v'_alpha
00095   
00096          alpha denotes a cartesian index.
00097   
00098          - isotropic case:
00099   
00100            only eta_x := eta is used and instead of step 1) we have
00101   
00102            1') eta(t+dt/2) = eta(t) + dt/2 * (1/3*Tr P(t) - P_ext)
00103   
00104            furthermore, in step 3) and 5a) L is replaced with V=L^3
00105   
00106          - tetragonal case:
00107   
00108            Lx := L_perp, Ly = Lz := L_par
00109            eta_x := eta_perp, etay := eta_par, etaz unused
00110   
00111            instead of step 1) we have
00112   
00113            1'a) eta_perp(t+dt/2) = eta_perp + dt/2 * V/L_perp * ( P_xx(t) - P_ext)
00114            1'b) eta_par(t+dt/2) = eta_par + dt/2 * V/L_par * ( P_yy(t) + P_zz(t) - 2*P_ext)
00115   
00116            steps 3) and 5a) are split into two sub-steps
00117   
00118            L_perp(i+1) = L_perp(i) + dt/(2*W)*eta_perp
00119            L_par(i+1) = L_par(i) + dt/(4*W)*eta_par
00120       */
00121 
00122       // obtain current stress tensor (diagonal components)
00123       system().computeStress(currP_);
00124 
00125       // obtain current box lengths
00126       Vector lengths  = system().boundary().lengths();
00127       double volume = lengths[0]*lengths[1]*lengths[2];
00128 
00129       double extP = system().boundaryEnsemble().pressure();
00130 
00131       // advance eta(t)->eta(t+dt/2) (step one)
00132       if (mode_ == Orthorhombic) {
00133          double Vdthalf = 1.0/2.0 * volume * dt_;
00134          eta_[0] += Vdthalf/lengths[0] * (currP_[0] - extP);
00135          eta_[1] += Vdthalf/lengths[1] * (currP_[1] - extP);
00136          eta_[2] += Vdthalf/lengths[2] * (currP_[2] - extP);
00137       } else if (mode_ == Tetragonal) { 
00138          double Vdthalf = 1.0/2.0* volume * dt_; 
00139          eta_[0] += Vdthalf/lengths[0]*(currP_[0] - extP);
00140          eta_[1] += Vdthalf/lengths[1]*(currP_[1] + currP_[2] - 2.0*extP);
00141       } else if (mode_ == Cubic) {
00142          eta_[0] += 1.0/2.0*dt_*(1.0/3.0*(currP_[0]+currP_[1]+currP_[2]) - extP);
00143       }
00144 
00145       // update the box length L(t) -> L(t+dt/2) (step three)
00146       // (since we still keep the accelerations a(t) computed for box length L_alpha(t) in memory,
00147       // needed in step two, we can exchange the order of the two steps)
00148       // also pre-calculate L(t+dt) (step 5a, only depends on eta(t) of step one)
00149 
00150       Vector lengthsOld = lengths;
00151       Vector lengthsFinal;
00152       double volumeFinal = 0.0;
00153 
00154       double dthalfoverW = 1.0/2.0*dt_/W_;
00155 
00156       if (mode_ == Orthorhombic) {
00157          lengths[0] += dthalfoverW*eta_[0];
00158          lengths[1] += dthalfoverW*eta_[1];
00159          lengths[2] += dthalfoverW*eta_[2];
00160          lengthsFinal[0] = lengths[0] + dthalfoverW*eta_[0];
00161          lengthsFinal[1] = lengths[1] + dthalfoverW*eta_[1];
00162          lengthsFinal[2] = lengths[2] + dthalfoverW*eta_[2];
00163          volumeFinal = lengthsFinal[0]*lengthsFinal[1]*lengthsFinal[2];
00164       } else if (mode_ == Tetragonal) {
00165          lengths[0] += dthalfoverW*eta_[0];
00166          lengths[1] += (1.0/2.0)*dthalfoverW*eta_[1];
00167          lengths[2] = lengths[1];
00168          lengthsFinal[0] = lengths[0] + dthalfoverW*eta_[0];
00169          lengthsFinal[1] = lengths[1] + (1.0/2.0)*dthalfoverW*eta_[1];
00170          lengthsFinal[2] = lengthsFinal[1];
00171          volumeFinal = lengthsFinal[0]*lengthsFinal[1]*lengthsFinal[2];
00172       } else if (mode_ == Cubic) {
00173          volume += dthalfoverW*eta_[0];
00174          lengths[0] = pow(volume,1.0/3.0); // Lx = Ly = Lz = V^(1/3)
00175          lengths[1] = lengths[0];
00176          lengths[2] = lengths[0];
00177          volumeFinal = volume + dthalfoverW*eta_[0];
00178          lengthsFinal[0] = pow(volumeFinal,1./3.);
00179          lengthsFinal[1] = lengthsFinal[0];
00180          lengthsFinal[2] = lengthsFinal[0];
00181       }
00182          
00183       // update simulation box 
00184       system().boundary().setLengths(lengthsFinal); 
00185 
00186       
00187       // update particles
00188       Atom* atomPtr;
00189       int   ia;
00190       Vector vtmp, dr, rtmp, dv;
00191       Vector lengthsFac, dtLengthsFac2;
00192 
00193       for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00194          lengthsFac[i] = lengthsFinal[i]/lengthsOld[i];
00195          dtLengthsFac2[i] = dt_ * lengthsOld[i]*lengthsOld[i]/lengths[i]/lengths[i];
00196       }
00197 
00198       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00199          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00200          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00201             for (ia=0; ia < molIter->nAtom(); ++ia) {
00202                atomPtr = &molIter->atom(ia);
00203                prefactor = prefactors_[atomPtr->typeId()];
00204 
00205                dv.multiply(atomPtr->force(), prefactor);
00206                vtmp.add(atomPtr->velocity(),dv);
00207 
00208                dr[0] = vtmp[0] * dtLengthsFac2[0];
00209                dr[1] = vtmp[1] * dtLengthsFac2[1];
00210                dr[2] = vtmp[2] * dtLengthsFac2[2];
00211 
00212                rtmp.add(atomPtr->position(), dr);
00213 
00214                rtmp[0] *= lengthsFac[0];
00215                rtmp[1] *= lengthsFac[1];
00216                rtmp[2] *= lengthsFac[2];
00217 
00218                atomPtr->position() = rtmp;
00219 
00220                vtmp[0] /= lengthsFac[0];
00221                vtmp[1] /= lengthsFac[1];
00222                vtmp[2] /= lengthsFac[2];
00223 
00224                atomPtr->velocity() = vtmp;
00225             }
00226          }
00227       }
00228 
00229       if (!system().pairPotential().isPairListCurrent()) {
00230          system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00231       } 
00232 
00233       system().calculateForces();
00234 
00235       /* the second step of the explicitly reversible integrator consists of the following to sub-steps
00236 
00237          6) v(t+dt) = v'' + 1/2 * a(t+dt)*dt
00238          7) eta(t+dt/2) -> eta(t+dt)
00239        */
00240 
00241       // v(t+dt) = v'' + 1/2 * a(t+dt)*dt
00242       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00243          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00244          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter)
00245          {
00246             for (ia=0; ia < molIter->nAtom(); ++ia) {
00247                atomPtr = &molIter->atom(ia);
00248                prefactor = prefactors_[atomPtr->typeId()];
00249                dv.multiply(atomPtr->force(), prefactor);
00250                atomPtr->velocity() += dv;
00251             }
00252          }
00253       }
00254 
00255       // now compute pressure tensor with updated virial and velocities
00256       system().computeStress(currP_);
00257 
00258       //  advance eta(t+dt/2) -> eta(t+dt)
00259       if (mode_ == Orthorhombic) {
00260          double Vdthalf = 1.0/2.0 * volumeFinal * dt_;
00261          eta_[0] += Vdthalf/lengthsFinal[0] * (currP_[0] - extP);
00262          eta_[1] += Vdthalf/lengthsFinal[1] * (currP_[1] - extP);
00263          eta_[2] += Vdthalf/lengthsFinal[2] * (currP_[2] - extP);
00264       } else if (mode_ == Tetragonal) {
00265          double Vdthalf = 1.0/2.0 * volumeFinal * dt_;
00266          eta_[0] += Vdthalf/lengthsFinal[0]*(currP_[0] - extP);
00267          eta_[1] += Vdthalf/lengthsFinal[1]*(currP_[1] + currP_[2] - 2.0*extP);
00268       } else if (mode_ == Cubic) {
00269          eta_[0] += 1.0/2.0*dt_*(1.0/3.0*(currP_[0]+currP_[1]+currP_[2]) - extP);
00270       }
00271  
00272       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00273       if (!system().pairPotential().isPairListCurrent()) {
00274          system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00275       }
00276       #endif
00277      
00278       /*
00279       // debug output
00280       double P;
00281       system().computeStress(P);
00282       std::cout << system().boundary() << std::endl;
00283       std::cout << "P = " << P << " ";
00284       std::cout << "Ekin = " << system().kineticEnergy() << " ";
00285       std::cout << "Epot = " << system().potentialEnergy() << " ";
00286       std::cout << "PV = " << extP * system().boundary().volume() << " ";
00287       std::cout << "Ebaro = " << barostatEnergy() << " "; 
00288       std::cout << "H = " << system().potentialEnergy() + system().kineticEnergy() +
00289                     extP * system().boundary().volume() + barostatEnergy() << std::endl;
00290       */
00291    }
00292 
00293    /* 
00294    * Get barostat energy.
00295    */
00296    double NphIntegrator::barostatEnergy()
00297    {
00298       double barostat_energy = 0.0;
00299       if (mode_ == Orthorhombic)
00300          barostat_energy = (eta_[0]*eta_[0]+eta_[1]*eta_[1]+eta_[2]*eta_[2]) / 2.0 / W_;
00301       else if (mode_ == Tetragonal)
00302          barostat_energy = (eta_[0]*eta_[0]+eta_[1]*eta_[1]/2.0) / 2.0 / W_;
00303       else if (mode_ == Cubic)
00304          barostat_energy = eta_[0]*eta_[0]/2.0/W_;
00305 
00306       return barostat_energy;
00307    }
00308 
00309    /* 
00310    * Get barostat mass.
00311    */
00312    double NphIntegrator::barostatMass() const
00313    {  return W_; }

00330    void NphIntegrator::setEta(unsigned int index, double eta)
00331    {  
00332       eta_[index] = eta; 
00333    }

00344       serializeEnum(ar, mode_);
00345    }
